Title: Boerenpsalm
Actors: Ronny Waterschoot, Jef Burm, Magda Lesage
Plot: This Flemish heimat-movie after a novel by Felix Timmermans, the title of which translates as "farmers psalm", is about the at first sight idyllic, but actually tragical life of Wortel, a god-fearing peasant in a pre-war Belgian v...
